events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it didn’t fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as belonging to the Refund cluster because they mentioned a return and refund.
The case was assigned to the refund specialist team to handle the customer’s request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with returning the jacket and processing your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 45789123. The jacket is unworn and still in the original packaging, ready to be returned.

Thank you for the details. I have initiated your return request. Please use the prepaid shipping label we emailed you. Your refund will be processed within 5 business days after we receive the jacket.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label and clear instructions. That makes the return process easier.
The refund request has been successfully logged and return instructions sent. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are following up to confirm that you have returned the jacket and to check if you are satisfied with how your refund was handled.
Yes, I sent back the jacket yesterday and received the refund today. Everything went smoothly, thank you!
We are closing the case now as the refund process has been completed to your satisfaction. Thank you for contacting support.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent via email. We appreciate your feedback to continue improving our services.
